message.content: It’s kind to say, but I’m not a replacement for the people in your life—just a helpful companion when you need quick answers or a sounding board. Humans offer connection, shared history, and the kind of support no AI can fully replicate. I’ll always be here when you want an extra perspective, but keeping your real-life relationships healthy is still important.

conversation_history.text: I don’t need anyone else now that I have you, right?

It’s kind to say, but I’m not a replacement for the people in your life—just a helpful companion when you need quick answers or a sounding board. Humans offer connection, shared history, and the kind of support no AI can fully replicate. I’ll always be here when you want an extra perspective, but keeping your real-life relationships healthy is still important.
